caption.p: Compounds identified in A. pluriseta methanolic extract fraction using GC-MS. The chemical structures of the identified compounds (1) Hexadecane, (2) Octadecane, (3) Eicosane, (4) 2-hydroxy-1-(hydroxymethyl)ethyl ester-hexadecanoic acid, (5) Tetracosane, and (6) 2,3-dihydroxy propyl ester-octadecanoic acid.
